quote_first:
“What time is it now?” she said.
“
quote_last:
.”
“In the morning?”
Herera’s friend leered at her. “No, there’s a total eclipse of the sun.”
title: Freedom
author: Jonathan Frantzen

quote_last: , when a preternaturally self-respecting porter dispassionately ascertained that nothing more would be required of him till morning and shut himself out of her presence, the girl subsided upon the edge of a bed of such sybaritic character as amply to warrant the designation de luxe, and, flushed and trembling with excitement (now that she dared once again to be her natural self) and with all incredulity appropriate to the circumstances, stared at the young woman who blankly stared back from a long mirror framed in the door.
title: Nobody
author: Louis Joseph Vance
